train_funct module

train_data

train_funct.photoz_all(inds_all, data, **config)[source]

Run the photo-z for all folds.

Parameters

  • inds_all –

  • data –

  • config (dictionary) – This parameter has several conf of the train.

Returns

Dataframe with photo and spec redshifts and id

Return type

DataFrame

train_funct.pz_fold(ifold, inds, data, **config)[source]

Estimate the photo-z for one fold.

Parameters

  • ifold (tensor) – id of a sample

  • inds (tensor) – Indices of the selected sources with flux information an

  • data (tensors) – Paus data

  • Ntrain (int) – train size

  • config (dictionary) – This parameter has several conf of the train.

Returns

Dataframe with photo and spec redshifts and id

Return type

DataFrame

train_funct.train(ifold, data, **config)[source]

Train the networks for one fold.

Parameters

  • ifold (tensor) – id of a sample

  • data (tensors) – Paus data

  • Ntrain (int) – train size

  • config (dictionary) – This parameter has several conf of the train.

Returns

networks

Return type

train_funct.train_all(data, **config)[source]

Train all the folds and saves the results.

Parameters

config (dictionary) – This parameter has several conf of the train.
